title: Member financial dues
context: [ยง279D-8] Member financial dues. (a) The policy board shall identify the member financial dues necessary to sustain the metropolitan planning organization. The member financial dues shall be provided by interagency agreement with the members. (b) Member financial dues received by a metropolitan planning organization shall be used to fund the unified planning work program. &copy; A policy board may allocate collective financial resources to fund a unified planning work program. [L 2015, c 132, pt of ยง1]
